00032 RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::LineEdit(){
00033   this->text="";
00034   this->setX( 0 );
00035   this->setY( 0 );
00036   this->canTakeFocus=true;
00037   cursorPosition=0;
00038 }

00091 const char* RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::getText(){

00095 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::draw( int x, int y ){
00096   int tempX=0;
00097 
00098   int xw=(x+this->x)-2;
00099   int yw=(y+this->y)-1;
00100 
00101   SLsmg_gotorc (yw, xw);
00102 
00103   if (this->hasFocus)
00104     SLsmg_set_color (6);
00105   else
00106     SLsmg_set_color (0);
00107 
00108 
00109   for (int i=1; i<width; i++){
00110     SLsmg_gotorc (yw, xw+tempX);
00111     SLsmg_printf( "_" );
00112 
00113     tempX++;
00114   }
00115 
00116   SLsmg_gotorc (yw, xw);
00117   SLsmg_printf( "%s", this->text.c_str() );
00118 
00119   SLsmg_set_color (0);
00120   //  SLsmg_gotorc ((y+this->y)-1, ((x+this->x)-2)+cursorPosition);
00121   SLsmg_gotorc (yw, xw+cursorPosition);
00122 
00123 }
00124 
00129 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::receiveKeyEvent(int ch){
00130   // a letter
00131   if (ch>64 && ch<123)
00132     addChar(ch);
00133   // a number
00134   if (ch>47 && ch<58)
00135     addChar(ch);
00136   // the space bar
00137   if (ch==32)
00138     addChar(ch);
00139 
00140   if (ch==1)
00141     moveUp();
00142 
00143   if (ch==2)
00144     moveDown();
00145 
00146   if (ch==3)
00147     moveLeft();
00148 
00149   if (ch==4)
00150     moveRight();
00151 
00152   if (ch==19)
00153     hitSuppr();
00154 
00155   if (ch==16)
00156     hitBackspace();
00157 
00158 }
00159 
00164 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::addChar(int ch){
00165   char c=ch;
00166   string tmp;
00167   tmp=c;
00168   this->text.insert( cursorPosition, tmp );
00169   cursorPosition++;
00170 }
00171 
00175 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::moveLeft(){
00176   cursorPosition--;
00177   if (cursorPosition<0)
00178     cursorPosition=0;
00179 }
00180 
00184 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::moveRight(){
00185   cursorPosition++;
00186   if (cursorPosition > (text.length()))
00187     cursorPosition=(text.length());
00188 }
00189 
00193 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::moveUp(){
00194     cursorPosition=0;
00195 }
00196 
00200 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::moveDown(){
00201     cursorPosition=(text.length());
00202 }
00203 
00207 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::hitSuppr(){
00208   string tmp1, tmp2;
00209 
00210   tmp1= text.substr( 0, cursorPosition );
00211   tmp2= text.substr(cursorPosition+1, text.length()-cursorPosition-1);
00212   tmp1+= tmp2;
00213   this->text= tmp1;
00214 }
00215 
00219 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::LineEdit::hitBackspace(){
00220   string tmp1, tmp2;
00221 
00222   tmp1= text.substr( 0, cursorPosition-1 );
00223   tmp2= text.substr(cursorPosition, text.length()-cursorPosition);
00224   tmp1+= tmp2;
00225   this->text= tmp1;
00226 
00227   moveLeft();
00228 }
